title.rendered: Air China Carry on | Hand Baggage

content.rendered:
Air China Hand Baggage allowance for International flights

First Class and Business Class passenger: 8kg of carry-on baggage.

Economy Class passenger: 5 kg of carry-on baggage.

Air China Hand Baggage allowance for Domestic flights

First Class passenger: 5kg of 2 pieces of carry-on baggage

Business Class and Economy Class passenger: 5 kg of 1 piece of carry-on baggage.

Air China Checked Baggage

Air China Excess Baggage fees

excerpt.rendered: Air China Hand Baggage allowance for International flights First Class and Business Class passenger: 8kg of carry-on baggage. Economy Class passenger: 5 kg of carry-on baggage. Air China Hand Baggage allowance for Domestic flights First Class passenger: 5kg of 2 pieces of carry-on baggage Business Class and Economy Class passenger: 5 kg of 1 piece of […]
